channel.title: HTML Quck-Edit
channel.description:
Well i was getting sick of opening and closing windows when attempting a website :| so i did this! Basically you retrieve code from your computer on the first tab, it loads on the second(where you do your editing) then once you click the 'save and test' button it will load up in the third tab.
If you get any errors please tell me about them.
Working on: - Syntax highlighting - [s]Overwrite (instead of choosing file location)[/s]
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?1m9a2xdenjh Language: C#
Ignore the file name ;p
